casebody.data:
Seth M. Harris, Appellant, v. Annie R. Platt, as Executrix, &c., Respondent. Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal from order denying plaintiff’s motion for costs of the action. Cornell, Secor Page, for appellant. Wm. R. Martin, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The order should be affirmed, with ten dollars costs and disbursements to be taxed.
